subject: Bank Of America.P.O.BOX 830175
body:
Bank Of America.P.O.BOX 830175
Dollars Texas 75283
Our Ref: BOA/IRU/SFE/15.5/WD/011
Working Hours: Monday-Friday
8 a.m.-9 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time(EDT)
Saturday and Sunday 8 a.m.-4 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time(EDT)
Notification Update Of Your Inheritance Fund
HOW ARE YOU DOING TODAY MY DEAR
THIS IS SEVERAL TIMES WE THE BANK OF AMERICA ARE SENDING YOU
THIS THE SAME EMAIL TO START PICKING UP YOUR PAYMENT AS WE TOLD YOU
BEFORE THIS INFORMATION REACH US SINCE LAST THREE WEEK AGO FROM OUR
CORPORATE HEADQUARTERS,
STATES THAT 
YOU ONLY HAVE 48 HOURS TO EFFECT PAYMENT FOR THE
ACTIVATION OF YOUR PAYMENT TO ENABLE YOU CASH UP YOUR FIRST $8,000:00
FROM YOUR TOTAL (FUND OF $3.5 MILLION  (THREE MILLION FIVE  HUNDRED
THOUSAND UNITED STATE DOLLARS WHICH WILL TRANSFER TO YOU COMPLETELY.)
SINCE YOU ARE FINDING IT DIFFICULT TO MAKE THIS PAYMENT WE HAVE
DECIDED THAT YOU ARE TO GO AHEAD AND PAY WHATEVER YOU HAVE FOR THE
ACTIVATION FEE SINCE YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO COME UP WITH THE REQUIRED FEE
TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE HERE ,
SINCE YOU DON'T HAVE THE REQUIRE FF SO GO AND SEND ANY AMOUNT OF
MONEY THAT YOU HAVE AT HAND NOW START FROM $25,$50,$75 $100 SO THAT WE WILL
ACTIVATE YOUR PAYMENT AND SEND IT TO YOU TODAY, UPON RECEIPT OF THIS
PAYMENT, I WILL GUARANTEE YOU 100% SURE THAT YOU MUST PICK UP YOUR
FIRST PAYMENT OF YOUR FUND WITHIN 2HR 30MINTS AFTER WE PICKING UP THE
MONEY FROM YOU AND I AM ASSURING YOU NOW THAT YOU WILL NEVER BE
DISAPPOINTED AFTER SENDING THE LAST FEE WHICH IS ANY AMOUNT OF MONEY
THAT YOU HAVE AT HAND PLEASE WE ARE VERY SORRY FOR ALL THE PROBLEM
THAT YOU HAVE PASSED THROUGH BECAUSE OF THIS YOUR BELONG PAYMENT OF
WHICH YOU FAILED TILL NOW
REMEMBER THAT ANY DELAY IS ON YOUR HAND NOW AND DON'T BLAME ANYBODY
HERE IF YOU LOOSE YOUR PAYMENT BECAUSE IS YOUR DUTY TO BE FAST AND
SEND THE MONEY SOONEST FOR YOUR TRANSFER TO BEGINS IN TRANSFERRING TO
YOU FOR YOUR TOTAL FUNDS OF $3.5 MILLION USD TO YOU IMMEDIATELY.
I REPEAT MY VOW AGAIN, ONCE YOU SEND THIS FEE DEFINITELY YOUR PAYMENT
MUST BE DONE TO YOU AND NOTHING MORE WILL BE REQUEST FROM YOU. NO
ADDITIONAL FEE AGAIN TO AVOID MISTAKE IN SENDING YOUR DAILY PAYMENTS
TO YOU, I SUGGEST YOU RECONFIRM YOUR FULL RECEIVING DETAILS
INFORMATION UPON CONFIRMING FEE TO
ENABLE YOU GET YOUR $8,000:00 USD, TODAY AND REMEMBER IF YOU MISS THIS
WONDERFUL OPPORTUNITY THAT MEANS IT WILL BE VERY HARD FOR YOU TO GET
THIS FUND AGAIN,
BE INFORMED THAT YOU WILL HAVE TO PAY THE BALANCE SUM OF YOUR
ACTIVATION UPON CASHING UP OF YOUR FIRST $8,000:00 USD, ALSO I AM USING
THIS MEDIUM TO INFORM YOU THAT IF YOU FAIL TO PAY THE BALANCE SUM THEN
YOU WILL LEAVE US WITH NO OPTION BUT TO DEACTIVATE YOUR PAYMENTS OF WHICH
YOU WILL AND CAN NEVER CASH UP THE BALANCE SUM. SO I WANT YOU TO SEND
THE AMOUNT YOU HAVE AT HAND.WITH THIS INFORMATION BELLOW. AND UPDATE
US AMOUNT THAT YOU SEND AND THE COPY. SEND THE PAYMENT DETAIL TO THIS
EMAIL, (
perezdave515@outlook.com
)
1. ANY AMOUNT .... FROM $25,$50,$75 $100 ANYONE YOU HAVE
SO RUSH TO APPLE STORE AND GET A ITUENS CARD OR STEAM CARD NOW AND
SEND ANY MONEY THAT YOU HAVE AT HAND NOW, CALL ME ON THIS LINE AS SOON AS
YOU SEND THE MONEY.
REGARDS,
THE MANGER OF BANK OF AMERICA

subject: Re: Bank Of America.P.O.BOX 830175
body:
Hello there,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your email and the information provided about the fund transfer. It's quite a surprise to hear about such a large sum of money.

However, I'm a bit confused about some details. Could you please clarify why there is an activation fee for the payment? Also, could you explain more about what happens if I don't manage to pay the full amount?

You mentioned that time is of essence here. Why is there such urgency? 

Lastly, you mentioned something about getting an iTunes card or Steam card. How does this relate to the bank transfer?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jewell
